item.title: Shortcode: codecaption
item.description: Source Github repository: Hugo Shortcodes Searched for hugo shortcodes and found this Github repo. Copied the HTML without the comments into layouts/shortcodes/codecaption.html and then just wrap the code to be displayed in a code box as per the example. There are other shortcodes to copy over. add the double curly brackets < codecaption lang="html" title="Code caption shortcode" > code to be displayed in the box < /codecaption > Purpose Adds title to code blocks.
